verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; The \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* of the \w inner|strong="H6442"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w* that \w looketh|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6921"\w* shall be \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w working|strong="H4639"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*; but on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* it shall be \w opened|strong="H6605"\w*, and in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the new \w moon|strong="H2320"\w* it shall be \w opened|strong="H6605"\w*.

And the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of \add that\add* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*, and shall \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* by the \w post|strong="H4201"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* his burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and his peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, and he shall \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* at the \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: then he shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*; but the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* shall not be \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* until the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w*.

Likewise the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* at the \w door|strong="H6607"\w* of this \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w* and in the new \w moons|strong="H2320"\w*.

And the burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* that the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* shall \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add shall be\add* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*.

And the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \add shall be\add* an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* for a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* for the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* as he shall be \w able|strong="H3027"\w* to \w give|strong="H4991"\w*, and an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* to an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*.\f + \fr 46.5 \ft as he…: Heb. the gift of his hand\f*

And in the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* of the new \w moon|strong="H2320"\w* \add it shall be\add* a \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*, and \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w*, and a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*: they shall be without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*.

And he shall \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* for a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* for a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and for the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* according as his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* shall \w attain|strong="H5381"\w* unto, and an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* to an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*.

And when the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* shall \w enter|strong="H0935"\w*, he shall \w go|strong="H0935"\w* in by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w porch|strong="H0197"\w* of \add that\add* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, and he shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* thereof.

¶ But when the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the solemn \w feasts|strong="H4150"\w*, he that \w entereth|strong="H0935"\w* in by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* to \w worship|strong="H7812"\w* shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*; and he that \w entereth|strong="H0935"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w south|strong="H5045"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*: he shall not \w return|strong="H7725"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* whereby he came \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, but shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* over \w against|strong="H5226"\w* it.

And the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of them, when they go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, shall go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*; and when they go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*, shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*.

And in the \w feasts|strong="H2282"\w* and in the \w solemnities|strong="H4150"\w* the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* shall be an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* to a \w bullock|strong="H6499"\w*, and an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w* to a \w ram|strong="H0352"\w*, and to the \w lambs|strong="H3532"\w* as he is \w able|strong="H3027"\w* to \w give|strong="H4991"\w*, and an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* to an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*.

Now when the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* shall \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* a \w voluntary|strong="H5071"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* or peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w* \w voluntarily|strong="H5071"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \add one\add* shall then \w open|strong="H6605"\w* him the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* that \w looketh|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w east|strong="H6921"\w*, and he shall \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* his burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* and his peace \w offerings|strong="H8002"\w*, as he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* on the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*: then he shall go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*; and \w after|strong="H0310"\w* his going \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \add one\add* shall \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.

Thou shalt \w daily|strong="H3117"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* a burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add of\add* a \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w* of the \w first|strong="H1121"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* without \w blemish|strong="H8549"\w*: thou shalt \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* it \w every|strong="H1242"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.\f + \fr 46.13 \ft of the…: Heb. a son of his year\f*\f + \fr 46.13 \ft every…: Heb. morning by morning\f*

And thou shalt \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* for it every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, the sixth \w part|strong="H8345"\w* of an \w ephah|strong="H0374"\w*, and the third \w part|strong="H7992"\w* of an \w hin|strong="H1969"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, to temper \w with|strong="H7450"\w* the fine \w flour|strong="H5560"\w*; a meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w* by a \w perpetual|strong="H5769"\w* \w ordinance|strong="H2708"\w* unto the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.

Thus shall they \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* the \w lamb|strong="H3532"\w*, and the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*, and the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \add for\add* a \w continual|strong="H8548"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H5930"\w*.

¶ Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; If the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* a \w gift|strong="H4979"\w* unto \w any|strong="H0376"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, the \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* thereof shall be his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w*; it \add shall be\add* their \w possession|strong="H0272"\w* by \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

But if he \w give|strong="H5414"\w* a \w gift|strong="H4979"\w* of his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* to \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, then it shall be his to the \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w liberty|strong="H1865"\w*; after it shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w*: but his \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* shall be his \w sons’|strong="H1121"\w* for them.

Moreover the \w prince|strong="H5387"\w* shall not \w take|strong="H3947"\w* of the \w people’s|strong="H5971"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w* by \w oppression|strong="H3238"\w*, to \w thrust|strong="H3238"\w* them out of their \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*; \add but\add* he shall give his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w inheritance|strong="H5157"\w* out of his own \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*: that my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* be not \w scattered|strong="H6327"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* from his \w possession|strong="H0272"\w*.

¶ After he \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* me through the \w entry|strong="H3996"\w*, which \add was\add* at the \w side|strong="H3802"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, into the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w chambers|strong="H3957"\w* of the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, which \w looked|strong="H6437"\w* toward the \w north|strong="H6828"\w*: and, behold, there \add was\add* a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* on the two \w sides|strong="H3411"\w* \w westward|strong="H3220"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, This \add is\add* the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* where the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* shall \w boil|strong="H1310"\w* the trespass \w offering|strong="H0817"\w* and the sin \w offering|strong="H2403"\w*, where they shall \w bake|strong="H0644"\w* the meat \w offering|strong="H4503"\w*; that they \w bear|strong="H3318"\w* \add them\add* not out into the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, to \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

Then he brought me \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w utter|strong="H2435"\w* \w court|strong="H2691"\w*, and caused me to pass \w by|strong="H5674"\w* the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H4740"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w*; and, behold, in \w every|strong="H4740"\w* \w corner|strong="H4740"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add there was\add* a \w court|strong="H2691"\w*.\f + \fr 46.21 \ft in every…: Heb. a court in a corner of a court, and a court in a corner of a court\f*

In the \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H4740"\w* of the \w court|strong="H2691"\w* \add there were\add* \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* \w joined|strong="H7000"\w* of \w forty|strong="H0705"\w* \add cubits\add* \w long|strong="H0753"\w* and \w thirty|strong="H7970"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*: these \w four|strong="H0702"\w* \w corners|strong="H7106"\w* \add were\add* of \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w measure|strong="H4060"\w*.\f + \fr 46.22 \ft joined: or, made with chimneys\f*\f + \fr 46.22 \ft corners were…: Heb. cornered, etc\f*

And \add there was\add* a \w row|strong="H2905"\w* \add of building\add* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* in them, round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* them \w four|strong="H0702"\w*, and \add it was\add* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* with boiling \w places|strong="H4018"\w* under the \w rows|strong="H2918"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w*.

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* he unto me, These \add are\add* the \w places|strong="H1004"\w* of them that \w boil|strong="H1310"\w*, where the \w ministers|strong="H8334"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall \w boil|strong="H1310"\w* the \w sacrifice|strong="H2077"\w* of the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.
